summary: This document is an email chain forwarding a tip from the National Human Trafficking Hotline (Polaris) to FBI New York regarding potential historic sexual exploitation of minor females in Tempe, AZ, involving Jeffrey Epstein and Lawrence Krauss at an Arizona State University event in February 2017. The tip alleges Epstein appeared at a breakfast with two young Eastern European girls who were stroking him.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Identified as the trafficker in the tip, alleged to have been at an ASU workshop breakfast in a robe with two young Eastern European girls.

persons.name: Lawrence Krauss
persons.context: Reportedly invited Jeffrey Epstein to the Arizona State University Origins Project Workshop on Artificial Intelligence as a major donor to the project.

persons.name: Noam Chomsky
persons.context: Mentioned in relation to a talk at Gammage auditorium on March 22, 2015, which Epstein was also invited to.

connections.description: Krauss invited Epstein to an ASU workshop as a major donor to the project.

events.title: ASU Origins Project Workshop Incident
events.description: At the Arizona State University Origins Project Workshop on Artificial Intelligence, Jeffrey Epstein allegedly appeared at breakfast in a robe with two young Eastern European girls (estimated 15-16 years old) who were stroking him.

events.title: Noam Chomsky Talk at ASU
events.description: Epstein was invited to a students-only pizza party for ASU students associated with a talk by Noam Chomsky at Gammage auditorium, to which he also brought a young woman.

events.title: Title IX Investigation Report
events.description: The incident at the 2017 ASU workshop was reported to Arizona State University during a Title IX investigation into Lawrence Krauss in the summer of 2018, but complaints about Epstein's behavior were reportedly never addressed.

locations: Tempe Mission Palms Hotel, Tempe, Arizona
6100 Red Hook Quarters, Suite B3, St. Thomas, VI 00802-1348
keyFacts: A tip alleges Jeffrey Epstein was at an ASU workshop breakfast in February 2017 in a robe with two young Eastern European girls (estimated 15-16) who were stroking him.
Lawrence Krauss invited Epstein to the ASU Origins Project Workshop on Artificial Intelligence as a major donor.
The tip states the incident was reported to ASU during a Title IX investigation into Krauss in summer 2018, but complaints about Epstein were not addressed.
Epstein was also reportedly invited to a students-only pizza party at ASU for a Noam Chomsky talk in March 2015.
The tip was submitted to the National Human Trafficking Hotline on July 13, 2019, and forwarded to FBI New York via FBI Phoenix.
